metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7581 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/routing/route_set.rb in Action Pack in Ruby on Rails 4.x before 4.2.5.1 and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (superfluous caching and memory consumption) by leveraging an application's use of a wildcard controller route.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activejob - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.6-1
No subscription required
